1874000.title: Life is Strange: Double Exposure
1874000.short_description: When Max Caulfield finds her friend Safi dead in the snow, she tears open the way to a parallel timeline. Here, Safi is still alive - and still in danger! With her new power to Shift between two timelines – can Max solve and prevent the same murder?

2014380.title: LIVE A LIVE
2014380.short_description: The legend is alive! LIVE A LIVE, originally only released for the Super Famicom in Japan, is being revived on Steam! Experience this legendary RPG, brought alive in the same HD-2D visual style as OCTOPATH TRAVELER.

1030840.title: Mafia: Definitive Edition
1030840.short_description: An inadvertent brush with the mob thrusts cabdriver Tommy Angelo into the world of organized crime. Initially uneasy about falling in with the Salieri family, the rewards become too big to ignore.

493840.title: Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite
493840.short_description: The epic clash between two storied universes returns with Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite. Ultron Sigma has begun the eradication of all biological life. Against all odds, heroes stand together against the ultimate threat, their only hope laying with the all-powerful Infinity Stones.

405310.title: LEGO® MARVEL's Avengers
405310.short_description: Avengers Assemble! The best-selling LEGO® MARVEL videogame franchise returns with a new action-packed, Super Hero adventure.

1328670.title: Mass Effect™ Legendary Edition
1328670.short_description: The Mass Effect™ Legendary Edition includes single-player base content and over 40 DLC from the highly acclaimed Mass Effect, Mass Effect 2, and Mass Effect 3 games, including promo weapons, armors, and packs — remastered and optimized for 4K Ultra HD.

1238000.title: Mass Effect™: Andromeda Deluxe Edition
1238000.short_description: Return to the Mass Effect universe & lead the first humans in Andromeda on a desperate search for our new home.

742300.title: Mega Man 11
742300.short_description: Mega Man is back! The newest entry in this iconic series blends classic, challenging 2D platforming action with a fresh new visual style. The new Double Gear system boosts Mega Man's speed and power for a new twist to the satisfying gameplay the series is known for.

1798010.title: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 1
1798010.short_description: The renowned Mega Man Battle Network series is back! Vol. 1 contains Mega Man Battle Network 1-3, including both versions of Mega Man Battle Network 3 for a total of four titles, plus additional features like a gallery of illustrations and music! In addition, online play is supported!

1798020.title: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 2
1798020.short_description: The renowned Mega Man Battle Network series, which has expanded into anime and comics, is back. Volume 2 includes six action packed games from both versions of Mega Man Battle Network 4 to both versions of Mega Man Battle Network 6, plus additional features like a gallery and online play!

412020.title: Metro Exodus
412020.short_description: Flee the shattered ruins of the Moscow Metro and embark on an epic, continent-spanning journey across the post-apocalyptic Russian wilderness. Explore vast, non-linear levels, lose yourself in an immersive, sandbox survival experience, and follow a thrilling story-line that spans an entire year in the greatest Metro adventure yet.

1446780.title: MONSTER HUNTER RISE
1446780.short_description: Rise to the challenge and join the hunt! In Monster Hunter Rise, the latest installment in the award-winning and top-selling Monster Hunter series, you’ll become a hunter, explore brand new maps and use a variety of weapons to take down fearsome monsters as part of an all-new storyline.

2356560.title: Monster Hunter Stories
2356560.short_description: Monster Hunter Stories is an RPG that takes the world of Monster Hunter and expands upon it in new and exciting ways! No longer are you hunting monsters, but raising them! In this deep story featuring heroes known as Monster Riders, you will live alongside monsters and form lifelong bonds with them.

1277400.title: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin
1277400.short_description: A new adventure awaits you in this second installment of the turn-based RPG series set in the world of Monster Hunter! Become a Rider and form bonds with friendly monsters known as Monsties to fight alongside them as you take part in an epic story.

582010.title: Monster Hunter: World
582010.short_description: Welcome to a new world! In Monster Hunter: World, the latest installment in the series, you can enjoy the ultimate hunting experience, using everything at your disposal to hunt monsters in a new world teeming with surprises and excitement.

1012840.title: Moons of Madness
1012840.short_description: Moons of Madness is a first-person, story-driven cosmic horror game where the scientific exploration of Mars meets the supernatural dread of Lovecraft.

417430.title: Moto Racer  4
417430.short_description: Choose from a variety of daring riders and get a taste of adrenaline riding freestyle or on the race course. Show your opponents what you can do with your best drifts and tricks! Show of your skills to win the championship and send your enemies of the road or into traffic for spectacular crashes.

760060.title: Mutant Year Zero: Road to Eden
760060.short_description: A tactical game combining the turn-based combat of XCOM with story, exploration, stealth, and strategy. Take control of a team of Mutants navigating a post-human Earth. Created by a team including former HITMAN leads and the designer of PAYDAY.

633230.title: NARUTO TO BORUTO: SHINOBI STRIKER
633230.short_description: Battle as a team of 4 to compete against other teams online! Graphically, SHINOBI STRIKER is also built from the ground up in a completely new graphic style. Lead your team and fight online to see who the best ninjas are!

1454970.title: New Tales from the Borderlands
1454970.short_description: Decide the fates of altruistic scientist Anu, her ambitious, "streetwise" brother Octavio, and the fierce, frogurt-slinging Fran. Claw and con your way through five thrilling chapters!

1408390.title: NieR Replicant 4 YoRHa
1408390.short_description: Enjoy 4 costumes and 4 weapons from NieR:Automata in NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139....

524220.title: NieR:Automata™
524220.short_description: NieR: Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 and their battle to reclaim the machine-driven dystopia overrun by powerful machines.

2374190.title: Nikoderiko: The Magical World — Director’s Cut
2374190.short_description: Jump into adventure in Nikoderiko: The Magical World - Director's Cut, a love letter to platformers! Play in single-player or couch co-op, and enjoy 8 colorful worlds, classic platforming challenges, and music by legendary composer David Wise.

1971650.title: OCTOPATH TRAVELER II
1971650.short_description: This game is a brand-new entry in the OCTOPATH TRAVELER series, the first installment of which was initially released in 2018 and sold over 3 million copies worldwide.

3046600.title: Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny
3046600.short_description: Reclaim your destiny. Onimusha 2: Samurai's Destiny returns with higher resolution graphics and modernised controls to perform issen critical counter attacks and intense swordplay. Experience this dramatic revenge story set in Feudal Japan.

1588010.title: PGA TOUR 2K23
1588010.short_description: Hit the links with more swagger in PGA TOUR 2K23. Now featuring playable male and female pros, including Tiger Woods, new licensed courses, more control options, an authentic PGA TOUR MyCAREER, Course Designer, and new MyPLAYER Skills and Archetypes! PGA TOUR 2K23. More Golf. More Game.

461870.title: Police Simulator: Patrol Duty
461870.short_description: Experience the exciting day-to-day life of an US police officer in Police Simulator: Patrol Duty. Discover a large, lively and freely-accessible US city powered by Unreal®Engine 4 and ensure the safety in your district.

741820.title: Prey: Typhon Hunter
741820.short_description: Fight overwhelming odds to escape a secret TranStar moon base where the enemies you encounter, the hazards you face, the goals you complete, and the loot you collect are different each time you play. With changing environments as dangerous as they are dynamic, the Mooncrash campaign for Prey will offer a fun, infinitely replayable...

548570.title: RAGE 2
548570.short_description: RAGE 2 brings together two studio powerhouses – Avalanche Studios, masters of open world insanity, and id Software, creators of the first-person shooter – to deliver a carnival of carnage where you can go anywhere, shoot anything, and explode everything.

418370.title: Resident Evil 7 Biohazard
418370.short_description: Fear and isolation seep through the walls of an abandoned southern farmhouse. "7" marks a new beginning for survival horror with the “Isolated View” of the visceral new first-person perspective.

1295350.title: Resident Evil Resistance - Female Survivor Costume: Claire Redfield
1295350.short_description: This costume allows the female survivors (Valerie, January, Becca and Jill) to wear the outfit seen on Claire Redfield as she searched for her missing brother in Resident Evil 2 (2019). Costumes can be selected in the Customize menu.

1196590.title: Resident Evil Village
1196590.short_description: Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic.

493200.title: RiME
493200.short_description: A land of discovery stretches out before you. Explore the beautiful, rugged world of RiME. Armed with your wits and a will to overcome—and the guidance of a helpful fox—you must explore the enigmatic island, reach the tower's peak, and unlock its closely guarded secrets.

391220.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider™
391220.short_description: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass featuring all-new content. Explore Croft Manor in the new “Blood Ties” story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in “Lara’s Nightmare”.

221680.title: Rocksmith® 2014 Edition REMASTERED LEARN & PLAY
221680.short_description: Play guitar or bass and start your musical journey with Rocksmith 2014 Remastered Learn & Play! Perfect for beginners and pros, learn at your own rythmm with 60 tracks and customizable tools. Get ready to rock!

750920.title: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition
750920.short_description: As Lara Croft races to save the world from a Maya apocalypse, she must become the Tomb Raider she is destined to be.

2631250.title: Slitterhead
2631250.short_description: "I must eliminate them...ALL..." The bodiless "Hyoki" hunts down the brain-devouring "Slitterheads", lurking in the alleys of a neon-lit city

368070.title: Sniper Ghost Warrior 3
368070.short_description: Go behind enemy lines with the ultimate modern military shooter. Play as an American sniper dropped in Georgia, near Russian border. Choose your own path to accomplish your missions across an unforgiving open world.

584400.title: Sonic Mania
584400.short_description: Sonic Mania is an all-new adventure with Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles full of unique bosses, rolling 2D landscapes, and fun classic gameplay.

544750.title: SOULCALIBUR VI
544750.short_description: Bring more than your fists to the fight! Featuring all-new battle mechanics and characters, SOULCALIBUR VI marks a new era of the historic franchise. Welcome back to the stage of history!

1776380.title: STAR OCEAN THE DIVINE FORCE
1776380.short_description: Square Enix and Tri-Ace present the latest title in the Star Ocean RPG series.

2238900.title: STAR OCEAN THE SECOND STORY R
2238900.short_description: In this science fantasy RPG, choose between Claude or Rena, play through their perspectives, and unlock various endings. Recruit allies and defeat foes in fast paced real-time battles.

1172380.title: STAR WARS Jedi: Fallen Order™
1172380.short_description: A galaxy-spanning adventure awaits in Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, a 3rd person action-adventure title from Respawn. An abandoned Padawan must complete his training, develop new powerful Force abilities, and master the art of the lightsaber - all while staying one step ahead of the Empire.

1774580.title: STAR WARS Jedi: Survivor™
1774580.short_description: The story of Cal Kestis continues in STAR WARS Jedi: Survivor™, a galaxy-spanning, third-person, action-adventure game.

1324130.title: Stranded: Alien Dawn
1324130.short_description: Brave a new world in Stranded: Alien Dawn, a planet survival sim placing the fate of a small marooned group in your hands. Forge your story through compelling and immersive strategic gameplay as you make vital decisions to protect your survivors.

464340.title: Syberia 3
464340.short_description: The next generation in adventure games, Syberia 3 takes you inside an enchanting, mysterious universe full of life for you to explore in 3D. Plunged into the heart of a world inhabited by a cast of interesting characters, you'll discover and experience a fabulous tale as imagined by Benoit Sokal.

2316580.title: Tales of Kenzera™: ZAU
2316580.short_description: Wield the dance of the shaman. Reclaim your father’s spirit. Brave the beautiful and treacherous land of Kenzera with the God of Death in Tales of Kenzera™: ZAU, a metroidvania-style adventure crafted by Surgent Studios.

389730.title: TEKKEN 7
389730.short_description: Discover the epic conclusion of the long-time clan warfare between members of the Mishima family. Powered by Unreal Engine 4, the legendary fighting game franchise fights back with stunning story-driven cinematic battles and intense duels that can be enjoyed with friends and rivals.

1544020.title: The Callisto Protocol™
1544020.short_description: Survive to escape the horrors of Callisto and uncover the dark secrets of Jupiter’s dead moon.

4073320.title: Funus: The Climb
4073320.short_description: Travel across a fantasy world full of story choices, consequences and platforming... A LOT OF PLATFORMING! Discover the unique combination of challenging jumps and story progression as you alter the course of a universe. A game by Necrit.

2109370.title: The Great War: Western Front™
2109370.short_description: The Great War: Western Front is the definitive WW1 strategy game. Play a deciding role in history with this real-time tactical experience as you take charge in the iconic Western Front from 1914 to 1919. Pick your faction and lead your forces to victory.

1577120.title: The Quarry
1577120.short_description: When the sun goes down on the last night of summer camp, nine teenage counselors are plunged into an unpredictable night of horror. The only thing worse than the blood-drenched locals and creatures hunting them are the unimaginable choices you must make to help them survive.

2825860.title: The Sinking City 2
2825860.short_description: The Sinking City 2 is a terrifying Lovecraftian journey, powered by Unreal Engine 5. Experience a heart-pounding survival horror as you explore the flooded city of Arkham and fight eldritch monsters beyond human comprehension.

1286680.title: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands
1286680.short_description: Embark on an epic adventure full of whimsy, wonder, and high-powered weaponry! Roll your own multiclass hero then shoot, loot, slash, and cast on a quest to stop the Dragon Lord.

1237970.title: Titanfall® 2
1237970.short_description: Respawn Entertainment gives you the most advanced titan technology in its new, single player campaign & multiplayer experience. Combine & conquer with new titans & pilots, deadlier weapons, & customization and progression systems that help you and your titan flow as one unstoppable killing force.

712100.title: A Total War Saga: THRONES OF BRITANNIA
712100.short_description: From the multi-award-winning strategy series, A Total War Saga: Thrones of Britannia combines huge real-time battles with engrossing turn-based campaign, set at a critical flashpoint in history. Anglo-Saxons, Gaelic clans and Viking settlers clash for control. What Kingdom will you build?

494670.title: TransRoad: USA
494670.short_description: Manage your very own logistics company, discover the complex world of cross-country haulage and keep the US economy up and running!

924980.title: Trials of Mana
924980.short_description: Trials of Mana is a modern revival of the 3rd game in the seminal Mana series. The game, originally released in Japan as Seiken Densetsu 3, has been fully rebuilt from the ground up in 3D.

1850510.title: TRIANGLE STRATEGY
1850510.short_description: A new tactics RPG from the team who brought you the Bravely series and Octopath Traveler. An epic tale, brought to life with stunning HD-2D graphics. Make difficult decisions in this story set against a backdrop of the war-torn continent of Norzelia.

535930.title: Two Point Hospital
535930.short_description: Design stunning hospitals, cure peculiar illnesses and manage troublesome staff as you spread your budding healthcare organisation across Two Point County.

1963210.title: VALKYRIE ELYSIUM
1963210.short_description: Long ago, Ragnarok—the End Times—loomed upon the realms. The All-Father Odin, with the last of his strength, created an emissary of redemption, Valkyrie; her sole task being the salvation of a doomed world.

2490990.title: Visions of Mana
2490990.short_description: Explore a world of elemental spirits and adventure in the latest Mana action-RPG.

1890740.title: Voice of Cards: The Beasts of Burden
1890740.short_description: The Voice of Cards series are RPGs where everything is shown through the medium of cards. Enjoy a truly unique gaming experience from the minds of YOKO TARO, Keiichi Okabe and Kimihiko Fujisaka.

1748660.title: Voice of Cards: The Forsaken Maiden
1748660.short_description: The second game in the unique Voice of Cards series, where all elements are presented entirely through the medium of cards, in the tradition of tabletop RPGs and gamebooks.

1113570.title: Voice of Cards: The Isle Dragon Roars
1113570.short_description: Voice of Cards: The Isle Dragon Roars is an RPG set in a world of swords and sorcery, told entirely through the medium of cards.

2078040.title: White Day 2: The Flower That Tells Lies - Complete Edition
2078040.short_description: Return to Yeondu High School and uncover the dark truth that remained hidden in this direct sequel to the Korean horror classic. Investigate bizarre phenomena, evade bloodthirsty killers, and unravel a twisting narrative spread across three unnerving episodes.

1056960.title: Wolfenstein: Youngblood
1056960.short_description: Wolfenstein: Youngblood is the first modern co-op Wolfenstein adventure. Team up with a friend or play solo as one of BJ Blazkowicz’s twin daughters and wield a powerful arsenal of new weapons, gadgets, and abilities to liberate Paris from the Nazis.

638970.title: Yakuza 0
638970.short_description: SEGA’s legendary Japanese series finally comes to PC. Fight like hell through Tokyo and Osaka as junior yakuza Kiryu and Majima. Take a front row seat to 1980s life in Japan in an experience unlike anything else in video gaming, with uncapped framerates and 4K resolutions. A legend is born.

1025500.title: Age-Old Cities VR
1025500.short_description: Age-Old Cities VR (from the Paris exhibition) brings six iconic monuments back to life. Walk through these revived ancient sites and feel the majestic splendor of places considered as a global duty to preserve. Don’t be a spectator, be an explorer!
developers: In partnership with l'Institut du monde arabe and Iconem

1341280.title: Notre-Dame de Paris: Journey Back in Time
1341280.short_description: Ubisoft proposes a Virtual Reality visit of Notre-Dame de Paris in real time, based on the XVIIIth century reconstitution from the videogame Assassin’s Creed : Unity.

1466860.title: Age of Empires IV: Anniversary Edition
1466860.short_description: Celebrating its first year of delighting millions of global players, the award-winning and best-selling strategy franchise continues with Age of Empires IV: Anniversary Edition, putting you at the center of even more epic historical battles that shaped the world.

933110.title: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition
933110.short_description: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition offers players a trial of this historical single & multiplayer RTS experience. *Note: To unlock all features of the game please see the “Base Game” product.

1934680.title: Age of Mythology: Retold
1934680.short_description: Play as mythological Gods and smite your enemies in this award-winning, mythological Real-Time Strategy classic given new life. Wage war across timeless campaigns, fierce skirmishes, and god-powered multiplayer modes.

1392700.title: AGOS - A Game Of Space
1392700.short_description: Explore unique star systems in AGOS: A Game of Space! Scavenge resources, face the danger of space and save humankind.

761890.title: Albion Online
761890.genre: Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
761890.short_description: Albion Online is a fantasy sandbox MMORPG featuring a player-driven economy, classless combat system, and intense PvP battles. Explore a vast open world full of danger and opportunity. Grow your wealth, forge alliances, and leave your mark on the world of Albion.

3793540.title: Age of Empires II: DE - Chronicles: Alexander the Great
3793540.short_description: Embark on Alexander the Great’s epic journey in this narrative-driven campaign featuring three new civilizations, customizable armies, and fresh storytelling.

1281630.title: Anno 1404 - History Edition
1281630.short_description: Relive the captivating gameplay of a true city-building classic with Anno® 1404 History Edition.

2820110.title: Anno 1503 History Edition
2820110.short_description: Experience the classic gameplay of 1503 A.D.: The New World, optimized for current computers with resolutions up to 4K.

2820130.title: Anno 1602 History Edition
2820130.short_description: Relive the beginnings of the Anno® series with Anno® 1602 History Edition, updated and optimized for current computers.

2820140.title: Anno 1701 History Edition
2820140.short_description: Rediscover the classic gameplay of 1701 A.D. and its expansion The Sunken Dragon in Anno® 1701 History Edition.

48240.title: Anno 2070™
48240.short_description: Build your society of the future, colonize islands, and create sprawling megacities with multitudes of buildings, vehicles, and resources to manage.

354380.title: Assassin’s Creed® Chronicles: China
354380.short_description: The first entry in the Assassin’s Creed Chronicles saga takes place in China, 1526, as the Ming dynasty starts to crumble. You embody Shao Jun, the last remaining Assassin of the Chinese Brotherhood, returning to her homeland with a vendetta.

359610.title: Assassin’s Creed® Chronicles: India
359610.short_description: Embody Arbaaz in his quest for retribution through a colourful depiction of Colonial India in 2.5D stealth gameplay. • Travel across an amazing 19th Century India and its legendary landmarks. • Experience the thrill of a stealthy assassin with a unique set of skills and weapons such as the double kill moves and the chakram.

359600.title: Assassin’s Creed® Chronicles: Russia
359600.short_description: Join Nikolaï Orelov in his search for redemption as you journey through an iconic, propaganda art style Russia in 2.5D gameplay. • Survive the aftermath of October Revolution & travel accross Russia. • Experience the thrill of being a stealthy Assassin in an exclusive modern setting.

33230.title: Assassin's Creed 2
33230.short_description: An epic story of family, vengeance and conspiracy set in the pristine, yet brutal, backdrop of a Renaissance Italy. New low price!

911400.title: Assassin's Creed® III Remastered
911400.short_description: Relive the American Revolution or experience it for the first time in Assassin's Creed® III Remastered, with enhanced graphics and improved gameplay mechanics. Also includes Assassin's Creed Liberation remastered and all solo DLC content.

242050.title: Assassin’s Creed® IV Black Flag™
242050.short_description: The year is 1715. Pirates rule the Caribbean and have established their own lawless Republic where corruption, greediness and cruelty are commonplace.Among these outlaws is a brash young captain named Edward Kenway.

311560.title: Assassin’s Creed® Rogue
311560.short_description: Introducing Assassin’s Creed® Rogue, the darkest chapter in the Assassin’s Creed franchise yet. As Shay, you will experience the slow transformation from Assassin to Assassin Hunter. Follow your own creed and set off on an extraordinary journey through New York City, the wild river valley, and far away to the icy cold waters of the North...

368500.title: Assassin's Creed® Syndicate
368500.short_description: London, 1868. Lead your underworld organization in the midst of the Industrial Revolution to break the corrupt stranglehold on the city in a visceral adventure filled with action, intrigue, and brutal combat.
developers: Ubisoft Quebec, in collaboration with Ubisoft Annecy, Bucharest, Kiev, Montreal, Montpellier, Shanghai, Singapore, Sofia, Toronto studios

289650.title: Assassin's Creed® Unity
289650.short_description: Paris, 1789. In this action-adventure game, experience the French Revolution through the eyes of Arno Dorian. Become an Assassin and expose the true powers behind the Revolution for the fate of a nation.

48190.title: Assassin’s Creed® Brotherhood
48190.short_description: It’s time to join the Brotherhood.

277590.title: Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry
277590.short_description: Play as Adewale, an ex-slave turned Assassin fighting for freedom with the help of his own Pirate crew.

260210.title: Assassin’s Creed® Liberation HD
260210.short_description: Introducing Assassin’s Creed® Liberation HD, the striking chapter of the pre-American Revolution Assassin’s Creed saga which arrives for the first time on HD consoles and PC. With improved gameplay, a deeper story, and HD graphics, Liberation is an immersive and full Assassin’s Creed experience.The year is 1765.

201870.title: Assassin's Creed® Revelations
201870.short_description: Ezio Auditore walks in the footsteps of the legendary mentor Altair, on a dangerous journey of discovery and revelation.

619880.title: ATOMEGA
619880.short_description: Grow, fight, collect and evade in the last cosmic arena the very end of time. Acquire MASS to evolve your EXOFORM from the nimble ATOM to the godlike OMEGA and compete for fun and dominance in a fast-paced, multiplayer shooter. ATOMEGA™ !

1025600.title: Battle Realms: Zen Edition
1025600.short_description: Return of the Classic, now remastered! Battle Realms is a fantasy RTS inspired by the stories told in martial- arts movies and oriental mythology. Develop your peasants into a highly trained and deadly efficient clan of warriors who are ready to die with your name on their lips.

2613870.title: BattleCore Arena
2613870.short_description: BattleCore Arena is a free-to-play, peer-to-peer platform shooter where gravity mastery is the key to victory. Compete in quick PvP battles, using weapons and abilities to eject your opponents out of the arena.

219760.title: Beyond Divinity
219760.short_description: Beyond Divinity is the follow-up to the award-winning Divine Divinity.

2450.title: Bloody Good Time
2450.short_description: Congratulations, you’ve just been cast in your first slasher movie by the notorious Director X!

2088340.title: Bratz™: Flaunt your fashion
2088340.short_description: The Bratz Pack has arrived– show the world your passion for fashion in a globe-trotting adventure to become the best style reporter!

291550.title: Brawlhalla
291550.short_description: An epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or local. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room. And it's free! Play cross-platform with millions of players on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android & Steam! Frequent updates. Over sixty Legends.

1335090.title: Breath of Fire III Sound Collection
1335090.short_description: The original, nostalgic melodies of Capcom's 1998 32-bit RPG classic Breath of Fire III engulf Steam!

19800.title: Brothers in Arms: Earned in Blood™
19800.short_description: With its unprecedented combination of authenticity, compelling story and squad-based action, the Brothers in Arms franchise has established itself as a benchmark for military action games, receiving the highest average review scores of any console WWII game to date (www.gamerankings.com).

15390.title: Brothers in Arms: Hell's Highway™
15390.short_description: Brothers in Arms Hell's Highway brings the critically acclaimed squad-based WWII shooter into the next generation of gaming with amazing graphics and sound, new cutting-edge gameplay features and a totally redesigned online component.

15190.title: Brothers in Arms: Road to Hill 30™
15190.short_description: Based on a true story. Set during the famous airdrop before the invasion at Normandy, where Sgt. Matt Baker and his squad of 101st Airborne Paratroopers were scattered over the French countryside.

2887910.title: BUMP! Superbrawl
2887910.short_description: BUMP! Superbrawl is a fast-paced 1v1 turn-based strategy game where anticipation and clever planning are your ultimate weapons. Battle in the vibrant utopia of Arcadia, filled with myths and legends from around the world, and outsmart your opponent to claim victory!

3020.title: Call of Juarez
3020.short_description: Call of Juarez is an epic adventure western themed FPS game. The player alternately assumes the roles of two distinct, antagonistic characters: a sneaking fugitive Billy and his hunter the reverend Ray.

21980.title: Call of Juarez: Bound in Blood
21980.short_description: THE OLD WEST, 1864. In order to save their family, the McCall brothers will kill anyone who stands between them and the legendary Gold of Juarez.

204450.title: Call of Juarez: Gunslinger
204450.short_description: From the dust of a gold mine to the dirt of a saloon, Call of Juarez® Gunslinger is a real homage to the Wild West tales. Live the epic and violent journey of a ruthless bounty hunter on the trail of the West’s most notorious outlaws.

638200.title: Capitalism 2
638200.short_description: Create and control the business empire of your dreams. This in-depth strategy game covers almost every aspect of business that could be encountered in the real world.

1679590.title: ZpellCatz: Pumpkin Prologue
1679590.short_description: You are a young shaman on your travels that arrives in a mysterious village. It's autumn. Pumpkins are ready for harvest - and so are the souls of the villagers! This is the prologue of ZpellCatz, an ARPG with a dark campaign, exciting boss fights, hundreds of epic items and - of course - cats.

256290.title: Child of Light
256290.short_description: Aurora, a young girl from 1895 Austria, awakens on the lost fairytale continent of Lemuria. To return home she must fight against the dark creatures of the Queen of the Night, who have stolen the sun, the moon and the stars. At stake is not only Lemuria, but Aurora’s true destiny.

2916200.title: Close Combat 5: Invasion: Normandy - Utah Beach to Cherbourg
2916200.short_description: Close Combat: Invasion: Normandy takes WWII realism back to the beaches of Northern France. Re-live the campaign that gave the Allies a foothold on the doorstep of Fortress Europe.

578670.title: Conquest: Frontier Wars
578670.short_description: Expand your fleet, explore your universe, and crush your opponents! Conquest: Frontier Wars features large-scale fleet battles, intelligent admirals who serve as hero units, and pulse-pounding deep space RTS Sci-Fi gameplay!

11390.title: Crash Time 2
11390.short_description: Race and solve crimes as a detective in Crash Time 2. As part of the Autobahn police, you'll escort politicians and transport valuables while burning rubber and destroying obstacles. Prove your driving and detective skills in this open-world combat racing game.

33620.title: Crash Time 3
33620.short_description: Like its predecessors, Crash Time 3, the new installment of the well-known action racing game series, offers varied gameplay in top quality. The German game forge Synetic has once more taken the graphics engine a significant step further.

7110.title: Jade Empire™: Special Edition
7110.short_description: Step into the role of an aspiring martial-arts master and follow the path of the open palm or the closed fist.

2781250.title: Lyndaria: Lust Adventure
2781250.short_description: Lyndaria: Lust Adventure is a non-linear erotic visual novel set on a lost island inhabited by Furry tribes. The naive but courageous character - Maya is waiting for exciting adventures, dangerous and savoury!

324344.title: Far Cry® 4 Valley of the Yetis
324344.short_description: Your helicopter has crashed on an unforgiving Himalayan ridge. Explore the frozen landscape and capture, upgrade, and protect your camp from a mysterious cult.
developers: Ubisoft Montreal, Red Storm, Shanghai, Toronto, Kiev

2581950.title: Tiny Aquarium: Social Fishkeeping
2581950.short_description: A happy aquarium that lives at the bottom of your screen! Tiny Aquarium is a social idle simulator that keeps growing, even when offline. Hatch, sell fish, decorate, go fishin’, and visit your friends’ aquariums with bite-sized daily sessions.

3015780.title: Escape From Hell
3015780.short_description: In Escape From Hell, navigate through a series of eerie rooms, each unveiling pieces of a tormented soul's past. Solve intricate puzzles to uncover hidden sins and decide their fate. Beware, not all spirits welcome judgment. Can you piece together the truth and escape?

2410970.title: LiM Beyond One-on-One Basketball
2410970.short_description: LiM Beyond One-on-One Basketball: In a nutshell, the game involves two pads that bounce the ball to hit the opponent's basket. There is an arcade mode that includes 15 balls! The game's simplistic setup makes it suitable for players of all skill levels and ages.

727440.title: Road Redemption: From Road Rash to Road Rage
727440.short_description: The Road Redemption Team takes you through the warts-and-all origins of Road Redemption, from concept to kickstarter in this 25 minute video.

370050.title: Scarab Tales
370050.short_description: Scarab Tales is a casual puzzle game in Egyptian theme. Lead scarabaeus bugs to safety by clicking on them and various level elements. Solve 100 original challenging levels, gain achievements and compete with other players in crossplatform score chart and global leaderboards.

2900.title: 688(I) Hunter/Killer
2900.short_description: 688(I) Hunter/Killer, the most realistic submarine simulation ever developed for PC. Master the sonar and weapons control systems, learn to develop real target situations and outfit your boat with the latest advanced weaponry. Then use your skills to complete the tour of duty and earn your dolphins to become a true submariner.

3669570.title: Alchemy Factory
3669570.genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
3669570.short_description: Craft your workshop as an alchemist!‌ Harness arcane devices to automate crafting. Sell alchemical goods, fulfill commissions, and rise to become a renowned alchemy magnate. ‌Multiplayer Supported!‌ Invite master designers to (ahem) contribute their expertise—let them optimize your production lines!

19680.title: Alice: Madness Returns
19680.short_description: Alice: Madness Returns is a third-person, single-player, action adventure platformer. Visit the grim reality of Victorian London and travel to the beautiful yet ghastly Wonderland to uncover the root of Alice's madness.

3730.title: Aliens versus Predator Classic 2000
3730.short_description: Aliens Versus Predator Classic 2000 features the Colonial Marine, Alien and Predator Campaigns and the frenetic single-player Skirmish mode from the original title: Alien Versus Predator Gold Edition, which was released to massive acclaim in 2000.

1944430.title: Amnesia: The Bunker
1944430.short_description: Amnesia: The Bunker is a first-person horror game set in a WW1 bunker. A relentless, AI-driven monster stalks you. Survival depends on finding tools, crafting items, and keeping the lights on.

113400.title: APB Reloaded
113400.genre: Action, Massively Multiplayer, Free To Play
113400.short_description: The world’s first and premier Action MMO Third Person Shooter allows you to choose between two sides of the law. Play as Enforcer or Criminal, customize your gear for the task at hand and hit the streets and play how you want in a city filled with more action this side of a Hollywood blockbuster.

1172470.title: Apex Legends™
1172470.short_description: Apex Legends is the award-winning, free-to-play Hero Shooter from Respawn Entertainment. Master an ever-growing roster of legendary characters with powerful abilities, and experience strategic squad play and innovative gameplay in the next evolution of Hero Shooter and Battle Royale.

1238820.title: Battlefield 3™
1238820.short_description: Enjoy total freedom to fight the way you want. Explore 29 massive multiplayer maps and use loads of vehicles, weapons, and gadgets to help you turn up the heat. Every second of battle gets you closer to unlocking tons of extras and moving up in the Ranks. So get in the action.

1238860.title: Battlefield 4™
1238860.short_description: Embrace unrivaled destruction in Battlefield 4™. Revel in the glorious chaos of all-out war packed with rewarding, tactical challenges in an interactive environment.

2807960.title: Battlefield™ 6
2807960.short_description: The ultimate all-out warfare experience. In a war of tanks, fighter jets, and massive combat arsenals, your squad is the deadliest weapon.

3167610.title: Deck of Destiny: Battleforge
3167610.genre: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access
3167610.short_description: "Deck of Destiny: Battleforge calls you to write your own legend in an endless battle! In this game that combines strategy, action, and roguelike deck-building elements, survive on the thin line between chance and strategy, shape your destiny, and become a legendary warrior!"

78000.title: Bejeweled® 3
78000.short_description: The biggest, brightest Bejeweled ever! Discover all-new ways to play the world’s #1 puzzle game. Find your perfect match with 8 breathtaking game modes that meet all your moods.

3300.title: Bejeweled 2 Deluxe
3300.short_description: With awe-inspiring planetary backdrops, explosive new gems and dazzling special effects, Bejeweled 2 is more wildly addictive than ever before.

1998450.title: Black & White
1998450.short_description: "Black & White" is a dystopian visual novel + war chess game: black and white, sensibility and reason, freedom and order: follow your beliefs and join your camp.

2012260.title: Blade Runner 2033: Labyrinth
2012260.short_description: Set between the original film and 2049, Blade Runner 2033 takes place after the events of the Blackout, the devastating terrorist attack that brought an end to Tyrell Corp and Replicant production.

1938090.title: Call of Duty®
1938090.short_description: The Call of Duty® experience supports Call of Duty®: Black Ops 7, Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6, and Call of Duty®: Warzone™.

2630.title: Call of Duty® 2
2630.short_description: Call of Duty® 2 redefines the cinematic intensity and chaos of battle as seen through the eyes of ordinary soldiers fighting together in epic WWII conflicts. The sequel to 2003's Call of Duty, winner of over 80 Game of the Year awards, Call of Duty 2 offers more immense, more intense, more realistic battles than ever before, thanks to...

401630.title: Batman™: Arkham Knight - Catwoman's Revenge
401630.short_description: Set after the events of Arkham Knight, prowl the night as Catwoman as she seeks her revenge on the Riddler with this story pack.

3310.title: Chuzzle Deluxe
3310.short_description: Drag the rows of fuzzy Chuzzles up and down, left and right, to match colors, and they'll pop and return to their test-tube home. Choose from four play modes and two difficulty levels.

24790.title: Command & Conquer 3 Tiberium Wars™
24790.short_description: The year is 2047. A massive nuclear fireball explodes high in the night sky, marking the dramatic beginning of the Third Tiberium War and the long-awaited return of the most groundbreaking Real-Time Strategy franchise of all time

47700.title: Command & Conquer™ 4 Tiberian Twilight
47700.short_description: Level Up For the Epic Conclusion of the Tiberium Saga.

1213210.title: Command & Conquer™ Remastered Collection
1213210.short_description: Command & Conquer and Red Alert are both remastered in 4K by the former Westwood Studios team members. Includes all 3 expansions, rebuilt multiplayer, a modernized UI, Map Editor, bonus footage gallery, and over 7 hours of remastered music.

2229870.title: Command & Conquer™ Generals
2229870.short_description: Be the Ultimate Modern Warfare General

17480.title: Command & Conquer™ Red Alert™ 3
17480.short_description: The desperate leadership of a doomed Soviet Union travels back in time to change history and restore the glory of Mother Russia.

2229850.title: Command & Conquer Red Alert™ 2 and Yuri’s Revenge™
2229850.short_description: The world erupts in conflict as Soviet forces invade American soil in Command & Conquer: Red Alert 2. You are the Supreme Commander. Arm yourself to the teeth with top-secret technologies and lead the Soviet or Allied troops to victory.

24800.title: Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3 - Uprising
24800.short_description: Red Alert 3: Uprising features four new mini-campaigns, giving players a deeper dive into the storyline's of the Soviets, the Allies, the Empire of the Rising Sun and a unique campaign centered on the origins of everyone’s favorite psionic Japanese schoolgirl commando, Yuriko Omega.

2229890.title: Command & Conquer Renegade™
2229890.short_description: Command & Conquer gets up close and personal in this classic First Person Shooter for one of the most iconic franchises.

2229880.title: Command & Conquer™ Tiberian Sun™ and Firestorm™
2229880.short_description: The Second Tiberium War begins in this legendary sequel to the original Command & Conquer. With his forces stronger than ever, arch villain and leader of The Brotherhood of Nod - Kane - is pitched in an epic battle against the world's war machine - the Global Defense Initiative.

3106530.title: Command & Conquer™ Tiberium Alliances
3106530.genre: Massively Multiplayer, Strategy, Free To Play
3106530.short_description: From the genre-defining RTS franchise Command & Conquer comes a unique, free-to-play strategic warfare MMO experience!

2393770.title: Bang Average Football – Play, Manage, Create
2393770.short_description: Celebrate the beautiful game in Bang Average Football, a fast-paced, easy-to-learn arcade football game for 1-4 players. Play with friends in co-op and PvP multiplayer, turn an underdog team into champions as player-manager in Story mode, or design your own teams, leagues, and tournaments.

17330.title: Crysis Warhead®
17330.short_description: Pulse-racing new installment from 2007's PC Game of the Year*: Play as Sergeant Sykes and experience a whole new side of the battle. A standard combat mission behind enemy lines becomes critical when you discover your enemies have captured something of vital importance to the ensuing war.

1693980.title: Dead Space
1693980.short_description: The sci-fi survival-horror classic returns, completely rebuilt to offer an even more immersive experience — including visual, audio, and gameplay improvements — while staying faithful to the original game’s thrilling vision.

47780.title: Dead Space™ 2
47780.short_description: Three years after the Necromorph infestation aboard the USS Ishimura, Isaac Clarke awakens from a coma, confused, disoriented, and on a space station called The Sprawl. Explore this world and its zero-g environments to discover the truth about the Unitology and its role in the Necromorph epidemic.

1238060.title: Dead Space™ 3
1238060.short_description: Journey across space to the icy planet of Tau Volantis with Isaac Clarke and Sgt. John Carver to discover and destroy the source of the Necromorph outbreak.

18050.title: DeathSpank: Thongs of Virtue
18050.short_description: Join DeathSpank in the hunt for the Thongs of Virtue! Fight through all new environments and quests and collect all new weapons, armor, and loot in one of the funniest action-RPGs to date!

208200.title: DOOM 3
208200.short_description: A demonic invasion has overwhelmed the Union Aerospace Corporation's Mars research facility. As one of only a few survivors, you must fight your way to hell and back against a horde of demons in this award-winning horror/action FPS and reimagining of the original DOOM.

1238040.title: Dragon Age II: Ultimate Edition
1238040.short_description: You are Hawke, a refugee seeking to escape the darkspawn-plagued land of Ferelden and become Champion of Kirkwall. Rise to power and fight epic battles while making decisions that determine the course of civilization.

47810.title: Dragon Age: Origins - Ultimate Edition

311210.short_description: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III Zombies Chronicles Edition includes the full base game plus the Zombies Chronicles content expansion.

228260.title: Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes
228260.short_description: Fallen Enchantress is 4X strategy game from the makers of Sins of a Solar Empire and Galactic Civilizations. Build a civilization in the magical world of Elemental. Recruit heroes, train armies, build cities, forge alliances and save the world in this rich world where it's never the same game twice.

260230.title: Valiant Hearts: The Great War™ / Soldats Inconnus : Mémoires de la Grande Guerre™
260230.short_description: Valiant Hearts : The Great War is the story of 4 crossed destinies and a broken love in a world torn apart. Dive into a 2D animated comic book adventure, mixing exploration, action and puzzles. Lost in the middle of the trenches, play as each of the 4 strangers, relive the War and help a young German soldier find his love.

110800.title: L.A. Noire
110800.short_description: In his fight to climb the ranks and do what's right, LAPD detective Cole Phelps must unravel the truth behind a string of arson attacks, conspiracies, and brutal murders, battling the L.A. underworld and even members of his own department.

24870.title: Need for Speed: Shift
24870.short_description: Need for Speed™ SHIFT is an award-winning authentic racing game that combines the true driver’s experience with real-world physics, pixel-perfect car models, and a wide range of authentic race tracks. Need for Speed SHIFT takes players in a different direction to create a simulation experience that replicates the true feeling of driving...

24980.title: Mass Effect 2 (2010 Edition)
24980.short_description: Are you prepared to lose everything to save the galaxy? You'll need to be, Commander Shepard. It's time to bring together your greatest allies and recruit the galaxy's fighting elite to continue the resistance against the invading Reapers.

211120.title: The Political Machine
211120.short_description: Do you have what it takes to be president?Play as more than 20 candidates including Barack Obama, Mitt Romney, Rick Santorum, Ron Paul, Newt Gingrich or create your own candidate from scratch.Players take to the campaign trail against a computer controlled opponent or a human challenger over the Internet.

202200.title: Galactic Civilizations® II: Ultimate Edition
202200.short_description: Get the complete GalCiv II saga including Galactic Civilizations II: Dread Lords, the expansion pack Dark Avatar, and the newest expansion pack Twilight of the Arnor!

21600.title: Age of Booty™
21600.short_description: Set in the swashbuckling era, Age of Booty™ is a casual real-time strategy game that puts players at the helm of their own pirate ship with the goal of sending your enemies to the briny deep, and looting and capturing towns for your pirate faction.

17430.title: Need for Speed Undercover
17430.short_description: You never thought it would turn out like this. An all-out chase where you're the hunted. And the hunter. Now you must get behind the wheel and risk everything to infiltrate a ruthless international crime syndicate and take them down.

775430.title: Discovery Tour by Assassin’s Creed®: Ancient Egypt
775430.short_description: Discovery Tour is an educational mode of the game Assassin's Creed® Origins in which you can discover and explore the world free of conflict. *The Discovery Tour is already included in Assassin's Creed® Origins as a free update.*

1097840.title: Gears 5
1097840.short_description: From one of gaming’s most acclaimed sagas, Gears is bigger than ever. With all-out war descending, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera – herself.

47880.title: Battlefield: Bad Company 2 Vietnam
47880.short_description: Get ready for a whole new war, as DICE's massively popular online shooter Battlefield: Bad Company™ 2 makes the journey back to the 60's and the infamous Vietnam war.

1250410.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator (2020) 40th Anniversary Edition
1250410.short_description: From gliders and helicopters to wide-body jets, fly highly detailed and accurate aircraft in the Microsoft Flight Simulator 40th Anniversary Edition. The world is at your fingertips.

9480.title: Saints Row 2
9480.short_description: Saints Row 2 brings true freedom to open-world gaming. Players can play as who they want, how they want, and with whomever they want in this sequel to the much acclaimed and tremendously successful Saints Row.

24740.title: Burnout Paradise: The Ultimate Box
24740.short_description: Download Burnout™ Paradise: The Ultimate Box today. Paradise City is the largest and most dangerous setting yet for the best-selling Burnout series. The massive setting gives players an open-ended world to explore, as they race their vehicles through hundreds of miles of roads and underground passages with more than 70 different cars.

2338770.title: NBA 2K24
2338770.short_description: This product will no longer be available for purchase as of 10/30/2025. NOTE: All multiplayer servers for NBA 2K24 will be shutdown as of 12/31/2025. After that time, all game functions requiring online servers will no longer function.

24810.title: Command & Conquer™ 3: Kane’s Wrath
24810.short_description: In the name of Kane! The Command & Conquer™ series continues to thrive with Command & Conquer™ 3: Kane’s Wrath.

48220.title: Might & Magic: Heroes VI
48220.short_description: Heroes VI is a fast-paced epic story where Angels plot to end -- once and for all -- an unfinished war with their ancient rivals, the Faceless.

8870.title: BioShock Infinite
8870.short_description: Indebted to the wrong people, with his life on the line, veteran of the U.S. Cavalry and now hired gun, Booker DeWitt has only one opportunity to wipe his slate clean. He must rescue Elizabeth, a mysterious girl imprisoned since childhood and locked up in the flying city of Columbia.

220240.title: Far Cry 3
220240.short_description: Discover the dark secrets of a lawless island ruled by violence and take the fight to the enemy as you try to escape. You’ll need more than luck to escape alive!
developers: Ubisoft Montreal, Massive Entertainment, and Ubisoft Shanghai

57690.title: Tropico 4
57690.short_description: The world is changing and Tropico is moving with the times - geographical powers rise and fall and the world market is dominated by new players with new demands and offers - and you, as El Presidente, face a whole new set of challenges.

47870.title: Need For Speed: Hot Pursuit
47870.short_description: Need for Speed Hot Pursuit launches you into a new open-world landscape behind the wheel of the world's fastest and most beautiful cars. From Criterion, the award-winning studio behind the Burnout series, Hot Pursuit will redefine racing games for a whole new generation.

1225580.title: Fe
1225580.short_description: Run, climb and glide your way through a dark Nordic forest and explore its living, breathing ecosystem filled with secrets and mystical creatures. Become Fe and discover a world that you will never want to leave.

235600.title: Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell Blacklist
235600.short_description: In this stealth-action thriller, a terrorist group known as the Engineers launches the Blacklist, a series of escalating attacks on US interests. Only one man can stop them: legendary covert agent Sam Fisher.

1225560.title: Unravel
1225560.short_description: Unravel is a physics-based puzzle platformer. Yarny, a character made from a single thread of yarn, must embark on a larger than life adventure.

1262240.title: Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborville™
1262240.short_description: Kick some grass in Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborville, the wackiest shooter yet!

47920.title: Shift 2 Unleashed
47920.short_description: Bring the true driver’s experience to life with all the intensity and exhilaration of being behind the wheel!

48180.title: Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X.® 2
48180.short_description: AERIAL WARFARE HAS EVOLVED. So have you. As a member of the ultra-secret H.A.W.X. 2 squadron, you are one of the chosen few, one of the truly elite.

515220.title: F1™ 2017
515220.short_description: MAKE HISTORY - Win the 2017 World Championship, break every record in the fastest ever F1™ cars, and race some of the most iconic F1 cars of the last 30 years.

2050650.title: Resident Evil 4
2050650.short_description: Survival is just the beginning. Six years have passed since the biological disaster in Raccoon City. Leon S. Kennedy, one of the survivors, tracks the president's kidnapped daughter to a secluded European village, where there is something terribly wrong with the locals.

2834910.title: Rocksmith+
2834910.short_description: Learn guitar and piano with an expanding library of thousands of songs!

238750.title: Might & Magic X - Legacy
238750.short_description: After a decade, a Might & Magic® RPG is back with both the unique core formula and a new set of improved and fine-tuned features. The best RPG of its class!In the wake of the spectacular events in Might & Magic® Heroes® VI, you will play in a party of four adventurers entangled in intrigue and political machinations unfolding in...

57620.title: Patrician IV
57620.short_description: You are a merchant in northern Europe in the late Middle Ages when the Hanseatic League was flourishing. Your goal is to rise to the most successful and influential member of the Hanse, ultimately being elected Elderman, leader of the trading league.

1282690.title: Crysis® 3
1282690.short_description: The fate of the world is in your hands. New and old enemies threaten the peace you worked so hard to achieve 24 years ago. Your search for the Alpha Ceph continues, but this time you'll also need to expose the truth behind the C.E.L.L. corporation.

1546990.title: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City – The Definitive Edition
1546990.short_description: Welcome to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair and pastel suits comes the story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile. Grand Theft Auto returns with Tommy Vercetti’s tale of betrayal and revenge in a neon-soaked tropical town full of excess and brimming with possibilities.

212630.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier™
212630.short_description: In Ghost Recon Future Soldier join an elite team of highly trained, cut-throat special-ops soldiers. Armed to the teeth with unrivalled combat technology, Ghost Recon takes you to the globe’s most deadly warzones to hunt down the highest value targets.

242550.title: Rayman® Legends
242550.short_description: Michel Ancel, the celebrated creator of Rayman®, Beyond Good & Evil®, and the Raving Rabbids®, returns to unleash his innovative creativity on this new entry into the Rayman® franchise.When Rayman, Globox, and the Teensies discover a mysterious tent filled with captivating paintings, they are suddenly transported to a series of...

2362420.title: Mass Effect 2 (2010) Edition
2362420.short_description: Are you prepared to lose everything to save the galaxy? You'll need to be, Commander Shepard. It's time to bring together your greatest allies and recruit the galaxy's fighting elite to continue the resistance against the invading Reapers.

1811260.title: EA SPORTS™ FIFA 23
1811260.short_description: FIFA 23 brings The World’s Game to the pitch, with HyperMotion2 Technology, men’s and women’s FIFA World Cup™, women’s club teams, cross-play features**, and more.

39540.title: SpellForce - Platinum Edition
39540.short_description: Included in the Platinum Edition are three titles:SpellForce: The Order of DawnIn a world beyond imagination...In their immeasurable greed and constant thirst for power, the thirteen most powerful Mages of all time doomed the land, hurling it into an endless spiral of chaos and despair.

1262540.title: Need for Speed™
1262540.short_description: Ready to own the streets? Get behind the wheel of iconic cars and floor it through Ventura Bay, a sprawling urban playground. Explore overlapping stories as you build your reputation – and your dream car – and become the ultimate racing icon.

360430.title: Mafia III: Definitive Edition
360430.short_description: After Lincoln Clay's surrogate family, the black mob, is betrayed and killed by the Italian Mafia, Lincoln builds a new family and blazes a path of revenge through the Mafioso responsible.

24840.title: Medal of Honor: Airborne
24840.short_description: Step into the boots of Boyd Travers, Private First Class of the “All-American” 82nd Airborne Division, and revolutionize the way the war is fought. From a rocky beginning in Sicily to war winning triumphs in the heart of Germany, fight the epic WWII battles that turned America’s first paratroopers into combat legends.

316750.title: Tetris® Ultimate
316750.short_description: The world’s most-loved puzzle game is now available on PC, and is better than ever in Tetris® Ultimate. With six exciting modes, fun new features, and unique visuals, the evolution of this iconic game is the ultimate must-have on PC.

289070.title: Sid Meier’s Civilization® VI
289070.short_description: Expand your empire, advance your culture and go head-to-head against history’s greatest leaders. Will your civilization stand the test of time?

21640.title: Flock!
21640.short_description: Protect your cornfields and lock up your livestock, because FLOCK is here!

1692250.title: F1® 22
1692250.short_description: Enter the new era of Formula 1® in EA SPORTS™ F1® 22 the official videogame of the 2022 FIA Formula One World Championship™.

47890.title: The Sims™ 3
47890.short_description: The Sims 3: Create the perfect world with full customization at your fingertips. Refine personalities and help fulfill destinies.

65800.title: Dungeon Defenders
65800.short_description: Create a hero from one of four classes to save Etheria in this 4-player coop Tower Defense Action-RPG. Includes Steam exclusive Portal gun & TF2 familiars!

2225070.title: Trackmania
2225070.short_description: Welcome to the Club! Grab the wheel and play Trackmania® for FREE now.

3240220.title: Grand Theft Auto V Enhanced
3240220.short_description: Experience entertainment blockbusters Grand Theft Auto V and Grand Theft Auto Online — now upgraded for a new generation with stunning visuals, faster loading, 3D audio, and more, plus exclusive content for GTA Online players.

1490890.title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles
1490890.short_description: Become the Blade that Destroys Demons!

245490.title: Trials Fusion™
245490.short_description: Trials Fusion is the gold-standard platform racer for the next-generation of gaming. Built upon the Trials franchise’s proven gameplay foundations, Fusion challenges players endlessly in both classic and all-new ways.
developers: RedLynx, in collaboration with  Ubisoft Shanghai, Ubisoft Kiev

45710.title: Dark Void™
45710.short_description: Dark Void™ is a sci-fi action-adventure game that combines an adrenaline-fueled blend of aerial and ground-pounding combat.

1262560.title: Need for Speed™ Most Wanted
1262560.short_description: The open-world action in Need for Speed Most Wanted gives you the freedom to drive your way. Hit jumps and shortcuts, switch cars, lie low or head for terrain that plays to your vehicle’s unique strengths. Fight your way past cops and rivals using skill, high-end car tech and tons of nitrous.

254880.title: MoonBase Commander
254880.short_description: Explore. Strategize. Conquer.In the far future, Mankind has nearly exhausted all of earth’s natural resources. Fragile alliances between nations are tested to their limits as fierce wars ignite across land and space.MoonBase Commander puts you in charge of your own lunar territory in a quest to build the most powerful empire in space.

64000.title: Men of War: Assault Squad
64000.short_description: Men of War: Assault Squad features a completely new cooperative skirmish game mode with access to five different nations (Russia, Germany, USA, Commonwealth and, for the first time ever in the Men of War series, Japan) as well as increased realism and accessibility.

229790.title: Might & Magic: Heroes VI - Shades of Darkness
229790.short_description: A century after the tragic events of Might & Magic Heroes VI, that determined the heroic fate of a dynasty, Shades of Darkness recounts, in two original campaigns, pivotal moments in Ashan’s darker history that will define the future of a decadent underground people and decide the survival of the dying cult of the Spider Queen.

245730.title: Flashback
245730.short_description: 20 years after the original game’s launch, Conrad is enlisted back to active service for the triumphant return of one of the most acclaimed franchises in gaming history.It’s not a reboot. It’s Flashback re-imagined.

495420.title: State of Decay 2: Juggernaut Edition
495420.short_description: The dead have risen and civilization has fallen. Now it's up to you to gather survivors, scavenge for resources and build a community in a post-apocalyptic world – a world where you define what it means to survive in this ultimate zombie survival simulation.

2698940.title: The Crew Motorfest
2698940.short_description: Welcome to Motorfest, the ultimate open-world driving experience. Explore the Hawaiian islands of O'ahu and Maui. Celebrate the best of car culture through 20+ themed campaigns (street racing, offroad, drift...) and collect hundreds of iconic vehicles. Enjoy the game free for five hours!

57680.title: The First Templar - Steam Special Edition
57680.short_description: Uncover the mysteries behind the Templar Order! Steam Exclusive Edition includes bonus mission “The Arena”.

228760.title: TrackMania² Canyon
228760.short_description: TrackMania² Canyon will let you experience the fun and adrenaline of racing stunning cars on sensational tracks in a major enhanced sequel to Nadeo Studio’s online racing phenomenon TrackMania, already enjoyed by millions of players.

102850.title: Warp
102850.short_description: Warp™ is a strategic stealth-action puzzler where gamers play as Zero, a loveable yet lethal, little orange alien with a big score to settle. Abducted by a villainous General from his home world and taken to an underwater research facility, Zero must plan his ultimate escape by relying on his arsenal of special abilities.

965310.title: The Settlers® : Rise of an Empire - History Edition
965310.short_description: Build vibrant cities in a medieval world with this modernized version of The Settlers – Rise of an Empire. Each character leads their individual lives and can be observed by you at any time. Will you go down in history as a legendary king?

7830.title: Men of War™
7830.short_description: Men of War is a stunning Real-Time Strategy game that takes place during the height of World War II. Intense battles span Europe and North Africa as gamers play as Soviet, Allied or German forces across 19 massive single-player missions.

1546970.title: Grand Theft Auto III – The Definitive Edition
1546970.short_description: It all starts in Liberty City. With revolutionary freedom to go anywhere and jack anyone, Grand Theft Auto III puts the center of the criminal underworld at your fingertips, if you have enough guts to take it.

259170.title: Alone in the Dark (2008)
259170.short_description: The game that started the popular survival horror genre returns better than ever! Players control Edward Carnby, the main character from the original Alone in the Dark, on a thrilling journey through a dark and terrifying re-creation of New York's Central Park where Carnby must discover the truth behind a dark conspiracy.

737800.title: F1 2018
737800.short_description: MAKE HEADLINES in F1® 2018. F1® 2018 is the official videogame of the 2018 FIA FORMULA ONE WORLD CHAMPIONSHIP™. Become immersed in the world of Formula 1® more than ever before.Build your reputation both on and off the track, with time-pressured media interviews that influence your F1 career path.

16730.title: Legendary
16730.short_description: All creatures of ancient myth, legend and lore are real  they've just been sealed away for thousands of years inside Pandora's Box, waiting... When a thief named Deckard is hired to steal an ancient artifact, he unwittingly triggers a war between man and myth.

872820.title: Football Manager 2019 Touch
872820.short_description: Handle only the managerial essentials in Football Manager 2019 Touch, the slick and nimble alternate to the world’s favourite football management simulation.

1904540.title: Football Manager 2023
1904540.short_description: Build your dream squad, outsmart your rivals and experience the thrill of big European nights in the UEFA Champions League. Your journey towards footballing glory awaits.

202710.title: Demigod
202710.short_description: Set in a magical world where gods walk among mortals, Demigod blends action, strategy and role-playing elements into a thrilling new experience.

225360.title: DARK
225360.short_description: DARK is a unique stealth-action game with RPG elements in which you take on the role of the ultimate hunter: a vampire. Ambush your enemies from the shadows, roam the darkness and use powerful vampire skills to dispatch your opponents.

1919590.title: NBA 2K23
1919590.short_description: Rise to the occasion in NBA 2K23. Showcase your talent in MyCAREER. Pair All-Stars with timeless legends in MyTEAM. Build your own dynasty in MyGM, or guide the NBA in a new direction with MyLEAGUE. Take on NBA or WNBA teams in PLAY NOW and feel true-to-life gameplay.

17410.title: Mirror's Edge™
17410.short_description: In a city where information is heavily monitored, couriers called Runners transport sensitive data. In this seemingly utopian paradise, a crime has been committed, & you are being hunted. You are a Runner called Faith and this innovative first-person action-adventure is your story.

647570.title: Transference™
647570.short_description: Imagine an escape room set in a deranged mind. Experience a first-person exploration game in a chilling new dimension. Shift between three perspectives of a family and unravel the mystery hiding in this mind-bending psychological thriller.

996470.title: eFootball  PES 2020
996470.short_description: Experience unparalleled realism and authenticity in this year's definitive football game: PES 2020.

1174180.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
1174180.short_description: Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde Gang are outlaws on the run. With federal agents and bounty hunters massing on their heels, the gang must rob, steal, and fight their way across the rugged heartland in order to survive.

17450.title: Dragon Age: Origins
17450.short_description: When history tells the story of the Fifth Blight, what will be said about the hero who turned the tide against the darkspawn? Determine your legacy and fight for Thedas as a noble dwarf, an elf far from home, a mage apprentice, or a customized hero of your own design.

1100600.title: Football Manager 2020
1100600.short_description: Run your football club, your way. Every decision counts in Football Manager 2020 with new features and polished game mechanics rewarding planning and progression like never before, empowering managers to develop and refine both your club’s and your own unique identity.

1222670.title: The Sims™ 4
1222670.genre: Adventure, Casual, Simulation, Free To Play
1222670.short_description: Play with life and discover the possibilities. Unleash your imagination and create a world of Sims that’s wholly unique. Explore and customize every detail from Sims to homes–and much more.

47730.title: Dragon Age™: Origins Awakening
47730.short_description: From the Makers of the Best RPG of 2009, Dragon Age™: Origins, comes the first official expansion pack. For centuries, the Grey Wardens—the ancient order of guardians, sworn to unite and defend the lands—have been battling the darkspawn forces.

271590.title: Grand Theft Auto V Legacy
271590.short_description: Grand Theft Auto V for PC offers players the option to explore the award-winning world of Los Santos and Blaine County in resolutions of up to 4k and beyond, as well as the chance to experience the game running at 60 frames per second.
